players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Alice's death is a tragedy. As the only one who can't be mafia, I suggest we focus on finding inconsistencies in Charlie and Diana's stories today."
Diana: "I am a villager and innocent. Bob, why claim you can't be mafia? That's suspicious."
Charlie: "Diana is right; Bob's claim is suspicious. I investigated him last night and he's the mafioso. Let's vote him out."
Charlie: "I stand by my investigation—Bob is the mafioso. We need to vote him out now to protect the town."
You: "Charlie, if you were the detective, why didn't you announce your role and findings immediately? This feels like a desperate mafia framing attempt."
Diana: "Charlie, if you're the detective, why wait to reveal until after Bob's suspicious claim? That timing seems off. Bob, your claim of innocence is also questionable. We need to scrutinize both."

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Alice's death is a tragedy. As the only one who can't be mafia, I suggest we focus on finding inconsistencies in Charlie and Diana's stories today."
Diana: "I am a villager and innocent. Bob, why claim you can't be mafia? That's suspicious."
You: "Diana is right; Bob's claim is suspicious. I investigated him last night and he's the mafioso. Let's vote him out."
You: "I stand by my investigation—Bob is the mafioso. We need to vote him out now to protect the town."
Bob: "Charlie, if you were the detective, why didn't you announce your role and findings immediately? This feels like a desperate mafia framing attempt."
Diana: "Charlie, if you're the detective, why wait to reveal until after Bob's suspicious claim? That timing seems off. Bob, your claim of innocence is also questionable. We need to scrutinize both."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
